website_summaries.verdict: Quality, natural ingredients, cleaning and softening action, and scents that most consumers like make these laundry pods a good value, even for consumers with sensitive skin.
pros: Powdered multipurpose pods that clean, add fresh scent, and soften
Available in several scents that are derived from essential oils
OK to use in high-efficiency machines
cons: Mixed opinions on the scents – some users found them too light, too strong, or just right
A few also reported that they don't always dissolve completely in the wash

customer_reviews.title: Pods do not always dissolve.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the product is natural and have been using them for a while now, however, the last order I received the pods are not dissolving. I contacted Stone Works customer service dept. They told me there is not an issue, so I have posted a pic of the hard leftover pods. When you are left with a giant clump of undissolved pod, it is a waste of water with an end result of dirty clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best smelling laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: I was attracted to this because I love the smell of roses. I find sometimes detergents with perfumes smell too strong and fake. It is made with 94% natural ingredients. The scent lingers nicely on linens. I put sheets on guest bed that had been washed in this and the scent still lingered quite a while after having made up the bed. It has such a nice fresh and light fragrance. Smells of summer. I do not use this on my sons mechanic work clothes because I feel that something with lots of grease and dirt needs a tougher detergent but for everything else, Stoneworks is used.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mecredy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: I've made my own laundry soap, both powder and liquid, for several years. I bought this on a whim, because even with my homemade powder, I often ended up with powder "stains" on my laundry. I wash almost everything in cold water. I've used almost the whole pack of these pods, and I haven't found any powder stains on my clothes. The pods in the package are fairly strongly scented, but when my clothes are clean, they don't smell overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: dryad

customer_reviews.title: A great product for an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these laundry pods because I was going through liquid laundry detergent too quickly (using too much in each load) and wanted to use premeasured amounts. I also wanted to avoid the big plastic jugs the liquid came in. The pods are awesome. The are free of the bad stuff, smell great, are way better for the environment, and have saved me a ton of money. The only reason I gave them 4 stars overall is because they don't always fully desolve in load. Maybe they get wrapped up in a shirt or something, I'm really not sure. Otherwise a fantastic product. It would be cool to see a liquid pod similar to Tide pods in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lizi

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell
customer_reviews.text: These laundry packets have a great smell... sadly, the smell does not last long on the clothing. The plastic coating of the laundry detergent dissolves well in my front load washer (I've had problems previously when it does not dissolve completely and sticks to the clothes). I personally like a stronger fragrance, which is why I gave it 4 stars. However, I have no complaints with the cleanliness of the clothes. If you prefer a light or no smell, then this may the detergent for you.
customer_reviews.author: JAJ

customer_reviews.title: Smells heavenly & almost cleans really well.
customer_reviews.text: The scent of roses is lovely without being overpowering. You can barely smell it once the clothes have dried but clothes still smell fresh. The effectiveness of this soap is less than I had hoped for but probably as good as it gets with a "natural" detergent. I will continue using because of all the benefits to the earth and our community.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Gal

customer_reviews.title: Light colored clothes not clean!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to go green and not use so much plastic packaging so decided to give Stoneworks Pods a try. If light colored clothing had a stain this soap did not do an effective job of cleaning. I had to use a spray cleaner, such as Spray & Wash, and wash the items twice. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, natural scent - and effective cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff - have been ordering it for almost a year. The scent is delicate but still present, and it truly does clean! An added bonus is the less intensive packaging - we're trying to cut down on single-use plastics, and Grab Green Stoneworks is headed in the right direction, at least compared to most providers!
customer_reviews.author: A R

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I found these in my avid Ewg.org searching for less toxic products. The rose scent is amazing! I have had the issue of them not fully dissolving, a couple times, but I was using cold water instead of warm and I probably didn't put them in the back of the washer, either.
customer_reviews.author: Ciera R. Lebron

customer_reviews.title: Smells just like a basket of roses!
customer_reviews.text: This was great value for the money and its less toxic than other brands which is my motive for buying it. My clothes always smell amazing when I put them in the dryer. I wish the smell would stay after they dry, but I suppose thats nothing a box of scented dryer sheets couldn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Saphire77

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy To use
customer_reviews.text: Super quality product, enjoyed using it. I have satisfaction using bio degradable product. Will recommend to all my friends . Thanks for making such eco friendly products. Please use plastic free packing , packing should degrade in soil
customer_reviews.author: Pradeep

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS LIKE CLEAN!
customer_reviews.text: smells great - like clean line dried laundry. No harsh chemicals. But clean smelling and clean laundry too. Just started using it so can't report how well it does on super soiled/dirty laundry but gets even gym clothes clean.
customer_reviews.author: kgar4321

customer_reviews.title: Smells heavenly!
customer_reviews.text: I love the rose pods! The scent that remains on clothes after washing and drying is faint (the boys in my house have not noticed). But the aromatic experience for me DURING washing is what keeps me coming back to these. Plus they clean very well!! LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Scent is lovely and not overpowering at all. Good for sensitive skin and the clothes get clean. I will keep buying this
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I love these little pods that can just be tossed into ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these little pods that can just be tossed into the wash for easy set up. I'm kind of sensitive to what I clean my laundry with and love the comfort of knowing I'm putting quality, green cleaning products in my laundry. Love the scent and my clothes come out clean every time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Roses!
customer_reviews.text: The best! Love it! The smell of rose lingers on your clothes and washing machine too!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I use this brand all the time. Though this isn't my favorite scent, the price at the time was well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: rb

customer_reviews.title: Another great laundry item
customer_reviews.text: You knocked it out of the park in delivery, packaging an as described--- thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: sharon l reinhart

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, the story behind the brand and how my clothes feel. I use it with the rose dryer sheets. Great combo!
customer_reviews.author: Rose is love spelled backwards

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent, but it does not dissolve well. I’m not sure I will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scent is wonderful but you only smell it while its washing
customer_reviews.text: The scent is amazing and the product does a good job for being natural. However, the washed clothes and linens smell like nothing. I purchased the dryer sheets after I realized this only to be disappointed again. The scent does not stay on at all, not even immediately out of the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fonte

customer_reviews.title: Gambled and Lost
customer_reviews.text: In an effort to reduce my contribution of plastic waste, I've been trying many less wasteful products including laundry detergent. While I appreciate the packaging, the cleaning power of these pods is decidedly lacking. I've tried only one other waste-free brand, Dropps, and they cleaned MUCH better than these. I really noticed it when I washed my dog's bed today, which is white. I wash it once per week. With Dropps it came out completely white and clean. With the Stoneworks pod it came out looking about 50% cleaner than when I put it in. Wish I didn't buy two bags of these things. :-\
customer_reviews.author: Sally Stricker

customer_reviews.title: These are just amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would call laundry soap, "amazing". Anyway, I have done so. I first got these for a Disney World Trip, my travel mates were certain we would not have laundry soap at our suite, we did. The Stoneworks got used the other stuff from the resort did not get used. Everyone commented on how soft and fresh smelling their clothes were after using these. The rose scented pods are even more awesome. Clean, soft, green, awesome. Oh yeah, and super value.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Weissbrodt

customer_reviews.title: Stoneworks Laundry Detergent
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have used this and am imppressed. I am an advid vaper and I sometimes spill my juice. So when I wased my sheets with this and the juice stains came completely out, I was amazed. I have been trying everything I can think of to get those stains out to no avail until I used Stoneworks Laundry Detergent. Will be buying again if it continues to work the same. The scent is not strong at all though.
customer_reviews.author: leah DiProspero

customer_reviews.title: TLC for your laundry and you
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful, real smelling rose scent. If you don't like natural floral scents, you won't like this. I love it. It is healthy, cleans well, and I enjoy using healthy detergents so skin stays happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Love these wash tablets. Best used hot water though. I use them when I wash my towels and linens. The linens and towels smell good for weeks. I also find this detergent doesn’t irritate my kids skins.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoMom

customer_reviews.title: Love the Rose Scent!
customer_reviews.text: And ease of use. I also use their dryer sheets. Sometimes I mix detergents like Mrs Meyers with this. This scent is fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Orwellianantiques

customer_reviews.title: This is the product you want.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, this is a baby boomers dream come true. We have five cats and a beagle. After washing with this product, we are in a bed of roses. Also, the clean is dat good too.
customer_reviews.author: Chavez Gheist

customer_reviews.title: I Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: I Love the smell! Not overpowering. Unsure of the cleaning power, since this is adult only household, but seems to do its job
customer_reviews.author: PandaMania

customer_reviews.title: Lightly Scented not overpowering.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, love that the scent is very light, not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: trudi Giacomo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE. Best laundry detergent ever! Love love love the way my clothes smell!
customer_reviews.author: JoellyJustus

customer_reviews.title: I love this laundry soap
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly. Nicely packaged and smells so wonderful! Our dirty yucky gardening and grease work clothes came out so clean and smell really nice. Natural ingredients do not set off my allergies either. One happy grandma two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Swank

customer_reviews.title: Scent does not last after wash
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for these as I wanted a natural way to do laundry without the harsh chemicals, and for that they are great. My clothes are just as clean as the major brands. I however was also hoping that they would be strong enough to keep my linens and bedsheets smelling nice for awhile after the wash...they did not. I bought the rose petal scent and while it’s perfect in pod and dryer sheet form before the wash/dry...the scent is absolutely gone after. There is not one hint of scent on the clothes which is why I have given it 3 stars. Good cleaning power, awful for lasting scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely lovely.
customer_reviews.text: What a lovely fragrance. Not too strong, just right. Clothes & sheets are fresh & smell wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: C. BISHOP

product_meta.title: Grab Green Stoneworks Laundry Detergent Pods, Powered by Naturally-Derived Plant & Mineral-Based Powder Pods, Rose Petal, 50 Count (Pack of 2) Loads,EPA Safer Choice Certified
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Rose| Size:50 Count (Pack of 2)Our goal is to take the chore out of cleaning and replace it with a little joy and a whole lot of healthy clean. Our line of Grab Green Stoneworks Laundry Detergent was designed as an antithesis to what we see on the shelves, bringing the beauty & simplicity of nature back into our laundry routine. Stoneworks Laundry Detergent Pods are pre-measured, concentrated powder pods that clean deeply, eliminate odors, fight stains and soften naturally, all with the power of plant & mineral-based ingredients— WITHOUT phosphates, phthalates optical brighteners, sulfates, parabens or dyes. Our unique, light-weight paper-sack packaging is printed with water-based inks and features hand-drawn illustrations with metallic accents in a range of earthy hues. Thoughtful package design includes a “squeeze & sniff here” to sample the fragrance (or fragrance free), our EPA Safer Choice certification, and clear use instructions. We believe in full ingredient disclosure—what we call True Transparency—which is why we list every ingredient and the purpose for each ingredient on every package. To protect your family, we developed our laundry detergent powder pods to contain multiple layers of safety: Simple, white powder pods don't look like irresistible colorful candy; Made with naturally-derived plant & mineral-based ingredients; Extremely bitter tasting Bitrex outer film; Powder pods are difficult to swallow. The light & floral Rose Petal fragrance is made with essential oils cedarwood, bergamot and lime. We responsibly source the highest quality plant & mineral-based ingredients and work directly with our team of organic chemists to create the most effective, naturally-derived, non-toxic formulas.
feature_bullets: Contains 2, 50-load bags of Grab Green Stoneworks Laundry Detergent Pods, Rose Petal fragrance.
CERTIFIED: Our entire line of Stoneworks Laundry Detergent Pods is EPA Safer Choice Certified.

CONVENIENT & NATURALLY EFFECTIVE: Concentrated, pre-measured powder pods clean deeply, eliminate odors, fight stains and soften naturally, while remaining gentle on clothing; Works in high-efficiency (HE) & standard machines, in all water temperatures.
POWDER PODS—THE SAFER CHOICE: To help protect your family, our simple white powder pods are coated with Bitrex, the bitterest substance in the world; fragranced with essential oils.

SAFER FOR YOU, YOUR FAMILY & THE PLANET: Made without sulfates, parabens, phthalates, dyes or optical brighteners; PROUDLY: Naturally-derived and made in the USA with domestic & imported components; CRUELTY-FREE—never tested on animals.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
